definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
"to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
to cover up/to conceal/to mask/to gloss over
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to polish (a written piece)/to qualify or modify (grammar)
to paint/to whitewash/to decorate/plaster/fig. to gloss over/to cover up

sentences.english: On his head was a mitre of black felt decorated with silver crescents.
sentences.chinese: 头戴黑毡法冠，冠上饰有银的新月。

sentences.english: Or hear old Triton blow his wreathèd horn.
sentences.chinese: 或聍听海神吹响饰有花冠的号角。

sentences.english: Yeah, I like the beading, and you wouldn't need jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我喜欢那些缀饰，那样你就不需要戴首饰了。

sentences.english: Mane and frill should be abundant, and particularly impressive in males.
sentences.chinese: 有丰厚的鬃毛和饰毛，而且雄性更为明显。

sentences.english: He carried a leather briefcase embossed with his initials.
sentences.chinese: 他带着一个饰有浮凸的姓名首字母的皮公事包。

sentences.english: Under the eaves brackets, ridge eaves are decorated with patterns.
sentences.chinese: 檐下有斗拱，脊檐皆饰有图纹。

sentences.english: The girl's shirt collar is laced.
sentences.chinese: 女孩的衬衣衣领饰有花边。

sentences.english: His heavily plumed tail is set high and lies flat on his back.
sentences.chinese: 尾根位置很高，长有浓密饰毛的尾巴平放在背上。

sentences.english: We hoist, on high, the bonnie blue flag that bears a single star.
sentences.chinese: 我们要高高升起饰有一颗星的美丽的蓝旗。

sentences.english: The tail is well feathered and set on just below the line of back;
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有许多羽状饰毛，位置是背线的下面。

sentences.english: Chill and serve up in a martini glass with a slice of apple.
sentences.chinese: 混合至冷入马提尼杯饰苹果片。

sentences.english: The coat is very abundant on the mane and frill.
sentences.chinese: 鬃毛和饰毛的毛发都非常丰富。

sentences.english: Subtle Acqua accents are also featured in the interior.
sentences.chinese: 柔和的湖蓝色调在内饰中也得到了应用。

sentences.english: With some decorations bought at Tiffany's.
sentences.chinese: 与数扮饰在丝纱罗买了。

sentences.english: Little marzipan carrots are the traditional decoration.
sentences.chinese: 当地传统上也用杏仁小饼和小胡萝卜作为缀饰。

sentences.english: Gradually narrowing toward the tip, they are shaped somewhat like a vine leaf and are lightly feathered.
sentences.chinese: 形状有点象葡萄叶子，有轻盈的羽状饰毛。

definition: to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
heroine (of a novel or film)/main female protagonist
to play the role of/to act
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
photo taken during a theatrical production/a still (from a movie)
hero (of a novel or film)/main protagonist
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account

pinyin: Bu4 lai2 te4 ni1 · Mo4 fei1

definition: to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
